website_summaries.verdict: Abrasion-resistant fabric and dual closures over thigh and back of knee mean all-day comfort from these cushion-and-foam knee pads.
pros: Pads designed for ergonomics and stability
Distribute weight evenly even with shifting and movement
Very highly rated by workers who spend a lot of time on their knees
Larger, more durable than some competitor products
High side wall to prevent twisting or kneecap slipping
cons: Surface may be too slick for some work
Some reports they're hard to fit to their leg/pinching, and aren’t comfortable with shorts

customer_reviews.title: Roofers, do not buy this model
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these seem to have all the features necessary for their intended purposes; except ONE. That particular Feature apparently is only available on one of their 'Lesser' Models. These will function great for many-many different types of construction work. But when it comes to Roofing, FORGET IT, these fail Big Time because they have a Slick / Hard Outer Surface which contacts the Roofing Materials; effectively "Slipping" when you need Grip & Traction on critical Slope Positions. So either locate the Lesser Model (somewhere), or Modify a pair of these by Cementing/Stitching some Inner-Tube or Neoprene to the Outer Shell. Then these will work for Roofing. Otherwise they're all but worthless, and pose a considerable danger to the Wearer.
customer_reviews.author: Artmon

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best 50 bucks I ever spent. I work for AT&T and am on my knees frequently. I have had them for just about year and they are finally almost in need of replacement. They never ride down my leg, I wear them 8-16 hours a day, and they have taken a beating from me. I'm 6'5" and 250lbs, I'm a big boy. I used to go through knee pads one a month. I could not be happier and grateful there is a company out there that delivers a superior product. They work just as hard as I do.
customer_reviews.author: H. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm 24 and work in construction. Pretty much everything. I was never really concerned with using knee protectors and such. After reading/hearing other people having knee surgeries because they didn't use them I made up my mind. I never really liked the ones from Home Depot so I ordered this. Seems well built, comfortable, I don't even feel my knees. It kinda elevates you off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: these are the best knee pads period
customer_reviews.text: I have been in construction over 40 years, these are the best knee pads period. They do not slide down to your ankles, they raise your ankles off the ground so your feet do not get sore, superior knee padding.I can work on these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: These things are so cool! I am a contractor
customer_reviews.text: These things are so cool! I am a contractor, who does a lot of floor work. Over the years I have owned many knee pads and all of them fall down and twist to the side, needing to be taken off and put on again often. What a nuisance this always is! These stay in place, feel great and seem like they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson C Shane

customer_reviews.title: Already broken !
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them for about 10 days and it’s already been broken! I hope you can exchange this because it's not normal.. I have use so many before and this never happened just after months and months
customer_reviews.author: Lizzgas

customer_reviews.title: The Bee's knees
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend these knee pads to anyone that spends anytime on their knees,youll be glad to have spent the money. Forget how they may look or they may feel a lil bulky,if your a construction type worker youll get used to it. They stabilize your knee so well its like wearing a medical knee brace,well padded too. They are very slick so if you are on your knees be sure your planted well and not on slick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Mummra

customer_reviews.title: WOW - Awesome Knee Pads if you Like Bruised Shins
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads look beautiful and feel great when you're on your knees, but when you stand up, they dig HARD into your shins. I have no idea why there are SO MANY great reviews for this product. Great if you never stand up. Purely Awful if you intend to ever stand up while wearing them. Mine are going back.
customer_reviews.author: B. Petrofsky

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pHd in knee pads. Been wearing them religiously for ~45 years. These are worth every penny!......here's why: 1) Super thick, your knees are cradled in a cloud. There is no thicker pad I have been able to find to date. 2) Stay in place-no slipping up, down, or laterally. 3) No bunching behind the knee. 4) Comfortable fit-they move with you.....never against you. 5) Well built-does not rely on velcro-uses velcro as an assist only. 6) Shape both lets you slide, but does not slip or rock-fantastic stability. 7) You look like you mean business. ;) People will salute you! =)
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Knox

customer_reviews.title: Kneepad fail
customer_reviews.text: I got these, thinking that because they were hinged and separately strapped to my thigh and lower leg, they would stay on my knees when I stood up, unlike other kneepads. No. The elastic cinching straps are too short to tighten adequately, and the wider remainder of the straps are covered in Velcro, making it practically impossible to tighten them without unhooking them from the clasp. Instead of a lightweight gel pad gradually sliding down my leg, these 2.6 lb. battleships sank to my ankles like stones. They are well-constructed and comfortable while kneeling on them, but not practical for real-world use.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a boilermaker I needed something better protecting my knees then the cheap knee pads we are issued. These knee guards are just amazing I'm always kneeling down on steal when welding and after 10 hrs or sometimes longer at work with the old guards I could barely walk afterwards and after using these guards I will never use another pair of guards again these make you feel like you are kneeling on air very comfortable (little stiff at first) I've had no problems with the straps or the buckles very well made knee guard highly recommended them actually 5 other men on my crew has purchased these same ones well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Richard Laberge

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 but inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knee pads, I have had them for 2 years without a problem so amazing i even ordered a new pair for a different job cite but the new pair didnt come with the gel or foam cushion on the high strap band I'm so confused because the price was identical and from the same manufacture/company toughbuild little disappointment the product seem inconsistent the 2nd time around . Overall still great but I probably wont buy it a 3rd time because I wont be sure if the will be the same quality as my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads truly do stay in place without slipping around on the leg - allowing one to get up and down, walk around, kneel down again immediately without having to put down anything one is carrying and adjust the pads. I have slight concern about the durability of the small buckles that secure the straps, so I'm taking care to preserve them - we'll see. With my 73-year old knees, being able to kneel straight down in one motion without needing to put a hand down first to reduce the rate of approach to the surface is very liberating.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after light use over the course of 2 months, barely.
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps broke and I’ve barely had them two months, and I was not rough with them, nor is my job one that it would have cause great wear and tear. These pads should have been overkill for my job, lasted me forever, but alas. It’s otherwise a great product, and I’m hoping I’ll be able to get ahold of the seller and get them replaced (I will edit this review to reflect that should that take place) but for how expensive they are, I should not have experienced this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Was so uncomfortable and it was cutting my circulation on my legs. I don’t recommend these to anyone. I’ve been a tile installer for over 20 years, these are the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Andyman

customer_reviews.title: Need to add felt padding if working on hardwood
customer_reviews.text: They are a little heavy, so i use them when i know i am on the floor for extended periods of time; if you work with wood floors insure you add felt pads to the knee pads and the shin pads below other wise you will create pressure marks on floors with out a finish or create dents in floors that have not had their finishes fully cured. Little hard to get them to stay on my legs but I have skinny legs. I like the product, the definitely stop the knee roll which make you want to curse the heavens! I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Valenza

customer_reviews.title: Not Made for Average Men
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11", 290 lbs. These do not fit, and you don't get your choice between sizes so there's no option to "buy bigger". Specifically, the elastic bands that go around the back of your thighs aren't long enough, so if you're a bigger guy, or if you just don't skip leg day at the gym, then these are not for you. Can you make them work? Yes, you can, but you're also severely diminishing the lifespan of them since in order to do so you have to entirely bypass the section of the retaining belts which have Velcro and rely solely on the elastic portions. I expected better for both the money and for the target audience of this product.
customer_reviews.author: coolasbluefire

customer_reviews.title: These are the best knee pads for comfort and durability
customer_reviews.text: I am a carpenter and the job I'm on requires me to be on my knees all day. These are the best knee pads for comfort and durability. The velcro and clip combo make them very sturdy on my knees. There is minimal slipping if not any in an eight hour day. I would recommend these pads to anyone who needs durable and comfortable knee protection. They are great and haven't failed me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Do alot of auto mechanic work in the driveway and garage floor. My old arse construction knees can't handle it no more so I got these because every other knee pad ends up a shin guard after ten minutes. Much to my surprise they work well and stay in place. I did have to make a few adjustments to find the sweet spot between comfort and sating in position. But once I found it we were golden. I could see these being a bit slippery(face of knee pad) for people doing hard wood floors. Once mine got scratched up in the driveway the issue went away for me. Over all I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Dansereau

customer_reviews.title: My ToughtBuilt knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I am a pipefitter which has me working on various surafces. I bought these because they looked like some heavy duty knee pads and they really are. I find them to be very comfortable and they do not slide off much. The only thing i would suggest to the manufacturer is to add some rubber grip to its surface/shell; that would be extreamly beneficial & helpfull. I was sliding arround at 1st but with use i made them have some grip. Other than that these are an extremely good set of knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: RARE but true: Everytime i use these, I am thanking myself for buying them
customer_reviews.text: I can not think of another purchase that I continuously thank myself for buying. My knees suck. Getting old sucks. Diabetes suck. Without these knee braces I am hating life for most projects. The hard outside part that touches the floor is.. hard... and can scratch new flooring so keep that in mind. I hacked a halved pair of shoe insoles and hot glued them on the outside so my new flooring was no problems. Then I took that off because it looked lame. Working on stone floors and tile are a joy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Clem

customer_reviews.title: So tough they scratched my hardwood floor!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These are great knee pads. They are thick and tough. The gel inside is comfortable. They are easy to get on and off with the latch system. Cons: Top strap is not long enough for bigger thighs. While you can latch it, you cannot attach the velcro to more than one velcro bar. Because of this, strap comes loose. These knee pads are so tough, THEY SCRATCHED MY BRAND NEW HARDWOOD FLOOR! I would not recommend these for hardwood flooring work. Overall, these will be great for everything except hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Stampcats

customer_reviews.title: It's like having new knees
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads don't just cushion your knees when you are working on a floor project. They are hinged and it is like being propelled with assistance when standing again. All people over 40 need these! Using these will stave off that knee replacement surgery for a few more years because it is so easy to move around in them and you don't have bruises the next day from crawling around.

customer_reviews.title: Great for yard work and around the house  👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: These particular knee pads are great for work such as cutting grass, picking weeds, laying down mulch, moving rocks and repairs for interior/exterior around the house they are very comfortable 🔥🔥 ToughBuilt does have “knee grip pads” depending on what you’re doing but I do not recommend going on the roof with these because there is no grip for the knee support it’s slick on the kneecap. Overall these are great knee pads for what I do in general 👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: EL PATO MAN 🌮😋

customer_reviews.title: Very adjustable for thin or heavy. Trade-Worthy.
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over some of the reviews in regards to them not fitting. I don't think they read the instructions or understand what they bought. I'm your average 175lb male. So I'm in the middle. Which means if you have the skinniest legs or the fatest legs they will fit you!! It's only 4 steps to complete a perfect fit people..! Definitely worth buying if your a Finnish Guy or a Framer or anything for that matter. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John m

customer_reviews.title: Omg we are in love
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I ordered these for a reno we were doing - flooring in 2 rooms. We watched a YouTube video and they used these. Their video hadn’t even ended and i was ordering these gel knee pads. Easy to put on, very comfy. Takes a few minutes to get used to them while you’re on your knees, but what a life saver. Neither of us likes doing anything on our knees, but now with these knee pads the possibilities are endless!!! Very comfy, saved us!!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for floor layer
customer_reviews.text: I've been a floor layer for about 6 years now my partner 40 years. He says these saved his career and are the most comfortable knee pads he has ever worn. A few issues to note. They will scratch certain laminate if you tend to slide, I'm young so I can easily walk on my knees. The gel or foam will wear down as usual but you get a good 4-5 months of great use before then. The band will stretch and start to slide down. These are very common issues with most knee pads but these outlast any pair I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Work well, stay put, and are comfortable for extended wear
customer_reviews.text: My knees are a little older now, and I still find myself needing to do work on the floor occasionally - so I picked these up. My biggest gripe about knee pads in the past was that they did not stay put, and the elastic only worked for a few uses before they gave up the ghost. These knee pads solved all that. They stay where you put them, are comfortable for extended wear. Concrete floors? Old knees? These make them get along.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS J RINGLEIN

customer_reviews.title: Nearly no slip, Never Pinxh
customer_reviews.text: I have unstable knees due to repeated acl and mcl tares these are the best (near no slip) knee pads for construction/landscaping I have ever used. They are bulky. However, I have not had any issues with snagging or being an issue there. I just was under a house sweating pipe. Awesome. I do have to adjust them once ever time I put them on to settle in with my pants, following that no slipping down and NEVER pinch
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great knee protector, and looks cool
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to be spending time on a project that requires you to work down on a knee or crawl around you'll be happy with this knee protector. You can feel great support along with being comfortable and confident that you won't feel small objects like pebbles and gravel through them.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, tough, stable, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had two full days of using these knee pads working HVAC crawling around under houses. They are extraordinary comfortable, very stable, and pretty tough. I dislocated my knee in high school and I’ve gone through quite the assortment of different brands of knee pads looking for one that stabilizing my knee and still allows me to bend and maneuver. The ToughBuilt knee pads are by far the best ones I’ve used to date. They are a little bulky but well worth it for the comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Simply in love
customer_reviews.text: This is a super highly recommend item so far the best pads out there in the market. The only isue that I can find if it is for some of you guys is that they are big and heavy, it is a very durable material hard plastic but the gel pad make em feel comfortable. I am very happy to add this to my gear because I work in the HVAC field I am in the attic a lot and this make me go through it super easy. I hope this review helps u.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what the description or reviews I read... Giving them a couple more days before I decide..
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the reviews, I checked on before purchase, as far as stability or comfort. I actually requested a return after trying them at home but decided to try at work first. I cancelled return for now. They are pretty scuffed after less than an hour on a roof. They slide like on ice on tile. They are pretty cumbersome but will give them a couple more days and see?
customer_reviews.author: Sean Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few weeks. They are amazingly comfortable and I am happy. I think the velcro straps will be the weak link in time. If I get 6 months out of them I will be happy and consider the investment to be a substantial win.
customer_reviews.author: John McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Used these in Shrek the musical play for a character who had to be on his knees the whole time. They took some major abuse from running around the stage for weeks. They held up wonderfully and kept the actor's knees comfortable. The biggest question after the play was "do your knees hurt??" To which he could confidently say "No!" The only improvement suggestion I could make is for them to be all black.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W.

customer_reviews.title: Work very well!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these a couple of times and I am pretty impressed so far. I had to spend almost an hour on my knees on a job and these knee pads were comfortable the whole time. I have the foam padded ones and they are very effective at protecting your knees. I would definitely recommend these knee pads to anyone who has to work kneeling down.
customer_reviews.author: Xanarchyx

customer_reviews.title: They barely strap up but stay secure anyway and are as comfortable as I have found
customer_reviews.text: Holding together well, use when on roofs when. prepping shingle roofs for solar. I'm 6'4" 320lb and my legs are huge. They barely strap up but stay secure anyway and are as comfortable as I have found. The best feature that I did not expect is how they relieve strain on ankles because of the extra humps on the bottom of the knee caps. Definitely recommend and it will allow you to work faster on hot or abrasive surfaces without killing your back.
customer_reviews.author: Troy D.

customer_reviews.title: Dug into my shins bad when i stood up
customer_reviews.text: THey look cool but that's about it. When I stood up they dug into my shins bad. Had to return. They certainly were nice, however. The cushion when kneeling was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Venture6

customer_reviews.title: For lots of different kind of work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these kneepads because I need them for work. No, not that kind of work. When I have to spend time on my knees to make a living, I always use these kneepads. No, not that kind of living.
customer_reviews.author: Drayton Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: As comfortable as knee pads can be expected, better than most, and boy do they protect the knees. If working on hard surfaces with rocks, nails, or other objects that can harm the knees, these are for you. They are the best Ive ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Burrowes

customer_reviews.title: Everything ive wanted in a knee pad
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are hands down the best ive ever worn for a work environment. The placement of the straps keep them from bunching in the back of your knee and the brace portion keeps you from sliding off to one side of the knee pad. This also works as a fairly good knee brace. If you have minor knee stability issues this will work for that as well. If you have major knee stability issues get a proper brace and wear these over them (they are roomy enough to handle something else. Speaking of which these pads are very large, i have gigantic legs and still have some room to spare with strap length.
customer_reviews.author: cassian

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I must say they're not a traditional knee pad. They're more like a knee pad exoskeleton device. I love how comfortable I feel after every use. The knee support is unlike any I have ever use. The gel cushion is like being on pillows. You can tell this was built by consumer response. I'm very happy with this product definitely 👍 worth the investment. If you have the money to spend on it. I would say buy it and tell the world how impress you are. I'll do an update a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort I've ever had in a kneepad
customer_reviews.text: I extremely rarely review Amazon purchases but these kneepads are worth their weight in gold. They're tough and supremely comfy. I'm only a home diy-er but I've done about 12 to 14 hours of work so far, fixing cracks in my driveway and ripping up old carpet in a bedroom, and the only discomfort I had was a little chafing from my pants. But a quick adjustment of the fabric on my pants, and no more problems! The shin support feature is great for keeping my feet from taking too much strain. Easy to adjust, put on, and remove. Amazing product...just amazing! I'll be keeping my eye on more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: NuGroovJazzBassPlayer alanealane

customer_reviews.title: cheaper kneepads basically do nothing compared to these
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the No Cry kneepads, which seem to be available under many different brandnames. However, they cause pain after just minutes. These ones completely eiliminate my knee pain, and that's coming from someone with screws in his knee that dig into the flesh when i kneel on something. These kneepads are clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Elektrodread

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a robot when I walk with them on.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the gel padding, helps my knees very well, they go on pretty easy, but I'm not a fan of the plastic clips that lock in place, I have to be careful as to not snap them off while taking them off. Looks cool, I get the "wow those look cool, how much, and do they work?" Price is good, and they work great. Just take care of them, and they'll take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Tirado

customer_reviews.title: Knee pads are never comfortable in general, but these makes the job of kneeling even harder
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad knee decided to get these pads, which have support. But they turned out to be bulky and slip down my leg, especially when working in the heat. The exterior is hard plastic so it gets scuffed up pretty quickly with shards of plastic peel if you are kneeling on gravel, such as working under a deck.
customer_reviews.author: AlanO

customer_reviews.title: Knee-walkers
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these knee pads were too much like a futuristic sci-fi appearance apparatus. After further research they really are applicable for my needs. I can actually walk on my knees for a lengthy amount of time on any hard surface, and not loose my balance at all. These knee pads are perfect for any project that entails one to get to the floor walking on your knees comfortably for a long time, and not feel pain afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knee Savers
customer_reviews.text: Best knee pads I've ever owned...GAMECHANGER! In the past wearing knee pads professionally for flooring jobs has been a painful experience...bad enough to bring a grown man to tears after 8 hours in a day. These pads are FAR better than anything I've used. Would have paid three times the price for these
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These are the best knee pads I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these knee-pads. After several pair of droopy and often uncomfortable knee-pads, I've finally found a pair that provide great padding and stay put, so I don't have to constantly tug them up while I work. Sure, they're expensive, but they're worth every penny. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Page

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. They were able to help the men in my family put in flooring in our entire home. I would not recommend a flooring job without them. Very protective. My only suggestion is to make sure that your pant legs are smooth when you put them on so as not to get blisters where the fold in the fabric is oh, but that has more to do with how they're put on then the quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestheword

customer_reviews.title: Saving my knees
customer_reviews.text: I've been a contractor for over 25 years, and I wish I had these knee pads the whole time. They are comfortable and easy to wear for the whole day. I saw the roofers review and agree that they can be slick on smooth surfaces. I am going to apply a non slip coating and see how its works. However, I have had several instances when working on floors, sub-floors etc. where having them slide easy has been nice. Maybe a suggestion to manufacturer to have both smooth and non slip surfaces available. Great product! I highly recommend them if you have bad knees or don't want to end up with bad knees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads ever for a contractor!
customer_reviews.text: Im a contractor, and have bad knees. These are the first knee pads i have found that actually work for me. They stay exactly where i put even after 7 or 8 hours of continuous wearing. They dont cut into the back of my legs or cut off circulation. They give a lot of side to side support when i am getting up or down. Very comfortable. I have worn them for a week doing flooring and base, and they rock! Hopefully they hold up, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: best kneepads I have ever owned in the masonry business
customer_reviews.text: these are my second pair because they work so well,am on concrete with them most days,have had the first pair for a year and am still wearing them,just bought the second pair because the first ones are just about finished,but have been more than abused and have always come through.keep making them and we will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: What's going on?
customer_reviews.text: Received my knee pads to day they seem okay? The box that it came in however was extremely damaged it look like someone was jumping on it then kicked it around for and hour or so then tossed it across the room against the wall then body slammed it to the floor for another hour or so. What is happening? All of my boxes that come to my door whether from ups or usps is heavily damaged what going on?
customer_reviews.author: weed wacker

customer_reviews.title: True Knee saver and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I spend a good bit of time with various projects on my knees. And at my age it hurts, during and after. I've had several different pads but these have done me the best. The fit and bend make them real comfortable when I have to get up and walk around and I don't need to take them off and on repeatedly regardless of the task.
customer_reviews.author: SKO

customer_reviews.title: 11/10 life saver for your knees
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them for myself. Use to always have knee pain, uncomfort behindback Of knees, knee pads falling to my ankles, with these knee pads they’re so comfortable, easy to go from kneeling, to standing, to kneeling again without readjusting. Good in all terrain. Used for a month daily, and gel is still in perfect condition. The gel pad is super thick and super comfortable for kneeling. 11/10 product and must have for guys in construction, flooring, decking, and concrete business in my personal opinion. My girlfriend who is 5’3” 110 lbs would love a pair, but they’re too large - curious if they came in smaller sizes for her.
customer_reviews.author: stanton Frank

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable, that you can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.text: These are the first knee pads with straps that don’t hurt my leg not slide down out of position. I have several knee pads that hurt my leg after wearing them for any duration. These are comfortable and stay in place all day without any motion limitation. They are extremely comfortable to kneel on and quick to clip on and off. I very much do not recommend them for roofers as they are slippery even on composition roofing shingles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what he needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! Our grown son had a terrible automobile accident in which both heels and feet were broken in September, and could NOT put weight on his feet for 3+months. He previously laid tile so he had a set of knee pads but they did not fit well. We ordered these and he was able to crawl around the house and have some independence in this bad situation. They fit well, stayed in position, and are very comfortable to wear. I highly recommend these knee pads for their standard usage and any unusual one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Barron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I work on heavy equipment and the hard plastic caps save my knees. Crawling around on tracks, compactor tips, and textured non slip steel I don't feel anything. I do wear these over pants they can get warm summer will determine if they get to hot. Pro's so far is I didn't feel anything, they stay in place besides the double Velcro straps, each strap has a locking tab that hooks into the plastic caps to help to retain the Velcro. Other knee pads I've used you could catch a strap and peel it loose. Con's the hard plastic caps can be slippery. As of now I would buy them again and do recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do not slip or slide around
customer_reviews.text: I'm in construction and have been wearing these kneepads for about 3 months now. I must say I love them! Their comfortable enough that I just leave them on even when on brake, they have quick release on the upper and lower portion of the kneepads.
customer_reviews.author: Loc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome until you really use them.
customer_reviews.text: These started out as the best knee pads ever. However after a week of using them the left knee pad somehow got stretched a little. So when I get up and walk it slides down my leg. When they are on my knees they are extremely comfortable and I could remain on my knees laying flooring for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Morris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment for my knees!
customer_reviews.text: Lmao well my kneepads look nothing like the pictures anymore. Owned them for almost a full year! I beat the living heck out of em. I do ALOT of manual work. After 1 week they looked old af. But still work 100%. Fast forward to now, still working as I bought them but all beat up. Had two knee surgeries, and I use these often!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better!!!
customer_reviews.text: After wearing my old kneepads and moving to this one, it makes me wonder why I would ever wear anything else, to begin with. This was a HUGE difference. The only issue I started to have was some chaffing in the back of the leg where the straps are - normal for just about any knee pads i think. One of the hooks came undone from time to time depending on the direction I move when kneeling. The velcro kept everything in place still though. End state, I'm so glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schommer

customer_reviews.title: Still ride down - not the greatest for Metal Detecting
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the ToughBuilt GelFit Fanatic - Thigh Support Stabilization Professional Knee Pads. Used today for 8 hours of metal detecting in some farm fields. They did not bend with me and rode down my leg just like any other Knee Pad. Knee protection was spotty and my pant knees still got wet and dirty. 2 stars, bulky, heavy, did not tighten and stay tight and most disappointing - they rode down my leg.
customer_reviews.author: William Stoffel

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads I’ve ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: They give me 6+ months of hard use. The previous record of any other brand was two months. I finally replaced them when the side use most often cracked. The comfort and stability is far superior to any other knee pads I’ve tried. I others have mentioned the hinges broke. I didn’t see that and they stayed robust throughout my usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: Have had lots of knee pads through the years. These are by far the best. I have two friends that have purchase these because of my recommendations. I am planning to get another set soon. No roll on the side and the best for staying where they belong of any I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Davenport

customer_reviews.title: So sorry it’s not good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use and take off Bomp into each other as I walk feeling sorry to purchase this product Hopefully the company improved
customer_reviews.author: David Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for a roofer!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a commercial roofer and great pair of knee pads are a necessity. I call these pads his robo-cop ones since they are quite large. He can get just about a year of use out of them even though he should change them out more often. Out of all the knee pads he has tried, these are the best and his favorite knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Katy H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I work on a trailer and have to get into various positions low to the ground. This is by far the best knee pad I've ever used. Doesn't slide it ride up. Doesn't pinch the back of your knee either. The home allowed it the flexibility it needs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good design that could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The main problem I have with this product is that it is sometimes difficult to get the locking clips open. Design should be changed so that it is easier to push them forward (against the elastic) so that they pop out.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! I have been looking for a good training collar for some time now and everyone I’ve tried has horrible battery life. But look no further!! This collar is rechargeable along with the remote. And you can charge both at the same time!! I have used this collar for a week and have not had to recharge it yet!! I love the 3 different stages beep, vibrate and shock. Would definitely recommend this collar!!
customer_reviews.author: TIM

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little and protect your knees.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second pair. Have a side by side comparison of the old and new. I’m 6’4” tall, 230 lbs. These knee pads are the best I’ve ever owned. The last pair really went through a lot of abuse over the last year and I couldn’t have been happier with them. Held up very well on a job site with a lot of walking, and kneeling on gravel, concrete and rebar. I use them everyday. Made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh That's More Like It
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have not yet had the opportunity to try these out on the jobsite, in a trial fitting, they seem very comfortable. They provide god support with the thigh strap, good cushioning and the pads are smooth on the outside so they slide. Sliding is a huge benefit for me. I hope these work as well as they look.
customer_reviews.author: Allan J.

customer_reviews.title: Stay in Place
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads work great. I love that they stay in place. My old pads would twist when I moved on the ground and fall down when I stand up or walk. These pads are very comfortable and they stay in place. Fast Shipping. TTP Retail is a great seller. I won't hesitate to use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Norman M.

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place - finally a knee pad that works
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stays in place. Tried so many other knee pads that didn't work -- this one does. Plus the rounded knee and elevated pad are great for ankle comfort when on knees. I work in a muddy environment at times and these worked great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Acheron2

customer_reviews.title: Good but with faults
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 27 years journeyman SMWIA so I’ve bought almost every knee pads. These are great unfinished hard surfaces only. If do hardwood floors these are not for you. I wear mine 6-8 hours a day they do get hot. Later wearing them for a couple months I have noticed where the are going to fail first. This is the buckles they are cheap plastic. It a shame because they are nice
customer_reviews.author: Kenney

customer_reviews.title: You can stop right here, there is no point looking at anything else..
customer_reviews.text: This things are amazing. I've tried a lot of knee pads over the years and they are JUNK. I spent hours in these kneeling in an attic on rafters. Spend the money for these, spend it once and be HAPPY you did. Anything else your gonna be hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: Must have this quality item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have quality item if you do projects around your home. Since I got these, I have almost no pain in my knees or legs while working on house projects. I should have got them much earlier. Five Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_me

customer_reviews.title: A real knee saver
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 60s and was a runner and had too many auto accidents and my knees are shot. With these on I flat out could not get the work done I get done as efficiently but also with not having to position myself to mitigate pain. They are easy on and off and I have worked with them on for hours in complete comfort. UPDATE 05/2020 still using these and they still are performing beyond expectation!
customer_reviews.author: Susieq

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: bottom half dig in to shin when walking up right
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Knee savers
customer_reviews.text: These stay where they belong without turning or sliding down like conventional knee pads. Maybe I have thin legs but the elastic velcro straps seem a little too long. Overall, very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to wear with shorts
customer_reviews.text: Knee protection is good, but I have an issue with the strap that goes around the thigh. I'm of a stocky build, so the strap doesn't fit perfectly causing the hook portion of the velcro to dig into the back of my leg. If the soft part and the hook part were reversed, there wouldn't be any discomfort (the soft part points outward and the hooks point inward) I ended up cutting up some old sweatpants to make a "sleeve" to wear underneath. Bottom line, if you have big legs, wear something under them.
customer_reviews.author: RS-DFW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of those cheap kneepads that slid around slid off hurt the back of your legs. These are comfortable and well padded they hold their position and are as comfortable as any pad can be.
customer_reviews.author: G. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a Jack of all Trades master of a few these Knee pads are the best I have ever worn in fact I helped sell a pair to a friend who was a plumber after trying these for a few minutes before I had to get them back cause he might not have given them back. Excellent product very little to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: love it

customer_reviews.title: Good but more than I need.
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable. I can have them on all day. But they have no grip and taking them off then on multiple times having to attach them is not for me. I prefer the once with just two points to attach them.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I have had different knee pads that didn't work great and left me with marks. These were used while putting on a roof and protected my knees and left no sore spots from the strap's.
customer_reviews.author: Doug m

customer_reviews.title: They look really good but they don’t fit me :/
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t one size fits all kind of deal they look really rugged and heavy duty but the top strap doesn’t go around my thigh I’m bigger built I will be returning product and getting the sellstorm ones Instead I’ve had those and they fit me good these are way too tight and bulky , the top strap barley went around my thigh and it was cutting circulation. I’m not that big so it’s for people with small skinny thighs
customer_reviews.author: Luis Solis

customer_reviews.title: These knee pads feel and look kind of like taken from Iron Man when you put them on ...
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads feel and look kind of like taken from Iron Man when you put them on (great for Halloween). But, I have installed 14K square feet of laminate flooring (from underlayment to baseboards) wearing these pads, they were comfortable and stable. They can be little warm on a hot days but not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zetis

customer_reviews.title: Solid knee protection
customer_reviews.text: Little pieces came off after the first use. They do slide down. They're bulky. They protect my knees, so there's that. In case you're thinking of using these indoors for anything other than demo (not sure why you would, but hey), look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and I would do it again!
customer_reviews.text: I have bad knees and I hate it when kneepads bunch up in the bend of your leg. These are absolutely fantastic! Comfortable stable and the only thing I might change if I could was to add a little grip to the hard exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm a union electrician who is currently crawling under prefab-houses and updating the electrical system. These knee pads are a great buy for comfort and for jobs that require the pads to stay on all the time. I have noticed my pants are a little too big for these knee pads, so you might want to wear pants that fit you snugly (the extra material bunches up over time). By far the best knee pads I have owned - even talked others into buying them. They initially called me "robocop."
customer_reviews.author: Casey L. Cox

customer_reviews.title: bulky but good
customer_reviews.text: My husband made fun of me when these arrived because they are pretty bulky and he's laying our new floor after having previously broken his knees in a car accident. He has since raved about how great they are and how much time they are saving him not having to move a pad around and they've stopped him hurting at the end of the day. safe to say, I was right.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hauptmann

customer_reviews.title: Solid knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I got these for ice fishing since my Carhartt bibs aren't waterproof and don't have any knee padding. They are super comfortable and the straps make them easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schraufnagel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pest Control Work and Attic Work / AC / electrical / crwal space
customer_reviews.text: Great for any pest control service tech. stay on all day through exterior bait stations or other trap check. PERFECT FOR ATTIC WORK! There is a little lip edge on the bottom of the front that "hooks'" on the edge of a 2x4 or other 45 corner to give great stabilization in tuff spots (watch your slip off point) THEY STAY PUT and are the most all day comfortable. A little skin irritation After 10-12 hours but man up. FOR ROOF WORK GET THE STABALIZER MODEL (DIFFERENT SET I CARRY BOTH IN MY TRUCK, THEY DONT SLIDE)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Baacke

customer_reviews.title: ... job and I've never had a pair that were great it perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use knee pads a lot on the job and I've never had a pair that were great it perfect... But these are great! I honestly think these are the knee pads I've ever purchased! As soon as I put them on, I could immediately feel the difference in comfort & quality! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These have made it possible for me to work on my vintage Mustang and Shelby by myself despite my elderly condition. I no longer avoid tinkering where I need to have my knees on the ground. Awesome, and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had them on today at work and let me tell you that they are the most comfortable knee pads I have owned My knee still feel a little sore but that's probably just me not use to being on my knees and they are still a little bruised from my previous cheap o NoCry knee pads Only thing that bothers me is when I'm on my knees but and sitting on my my heels the straps are to thick and kind of bother me
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Good for work and home as well
customer_reviews.text: This is the knee pad of knee pads. Well atleast in building trades it is. I wear everyday so comfy i forget i have them on sometimes. One time i drove all the way home walked in and went to town on the wifey.. She even noticed big difference on my performance.. I was able to handle biz on cold kitchen floor for about an hour or so. Not one scratch on my knees.. Wifey still smilling to this day😌
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a Roofer, and knee pads are a necessity. Have tried several brands, and these are BY FAR the most durable, and he says they're the most comfortable. One pair lasts him about a year, with minimum 50hrs per week use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and support
customer_reviews.text: Just had meniscus surgery. Have a physical job that requires me to be on my knees alot. So I ordered these knee pads. So far they fit good and I dont feel alot of pressure on my knee compared to other knee pads. I dont know how long the padding and support will last since I will use them all day long. But I will update with that later on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rivera

product_meta.title: ToughBuilt - Gelfit Thigh Support Stabilization Knee Pads - Ergonomic Fit - (TB-KP-G3)
feature_bullets: Comfortable GelFit gel cushion and foam design
Pro EVA elastic leg straps comfortably hold their place without cutting off circulation.
High side wall greatly reduce twisting off of the knee. Protective Knee Pads with Anti-slip.
Maximizes pressure distribution for all-day comfort and the perfect kneepad for every job

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,813 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
